nodes.text: Kenrik Fost was a male Kadas'sa'Nikto living during the Galactic War. In 3631 BBY he was the captain of the Brekken Gang of Nikto. They have received order from Gault Rennow for obtaining a functional missile, with the trade-off scheduled at Vandin. However, Gault's partner Vette managed to sneak inside the missile and sabotage it. When Gault arrived, he refused to pay for the whole missile and activated its warhead, prompting Kenrik Fost and his men to run.
Kenrik Fost appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire Chapter 13: Profit and Plunder.
